posts.post_content:
Hi All:
I have the following T 206 for sale great cards for the money

Devlin SGC 30 beautiful card P150 must be some slight glue stain but I cant see . Looks at least 2 grades higher. 35.00

McGraw Finger pointing P150 SGC 20, not sure what is wrong with this one. A steal at 65.00  SOLD

Hummel P 350-460 beautiful PSA 2 Looks like a 7 front and back. No creases. 35.00 SOLD

Charles P350 same thing looks like a 5 or 6 35.00 SOLD

Easterly nice portrait card some very minor wrinkles PSA 3 35.00

Parent PSA 4 mk initials stamped on back nice color. 30.00 SOLD

Doc White Portrait P350  SGC 60  85.00 SOLD
Doc White portrait P150 nice PSa 4 45.00 SOLD

pm or email [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url] which is also my paypall address..
Thanks all
PM sent on Hummel, Charles, & Parent

Doug,

Payment sent.  I look forward to another smooth transaction.

Best,

Eric
I'll take Devlin and Easterly if they are still available. Please and thank you :)

Doug,

The card arrived earlier this weekend.  Thanks again for another great transaction.

Best Regards,

Eric
